attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
As we currently have so much rubbish on television and with freeview being widely available to all, I propose that nineties kids show sm:tv is shown again in its entirety, from the first show up until cat deeley left the show.

The cartoons that the were shown in between the live studio parts can be left out, and if you show one episode a day at around 7pm i am sure that alot of people will watch.
CD:uk could also be shown afterwards as well.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
